description: This file defines a ServiceLocator object that provides access to different repository implementations, currently mocked versions, with a provision to switch to real implementations in the future.

classes.name: ServiceLocator
classes.description: An object acting as a service locator to provide various data repositories, with support for switching between mock and real implementations.

methods.name: contentRepository
methods.description: Provides an instance of ContentRepository, currently mocked.

methods.name: metadataRepository
methods.description: Provides an instance of MetadataRepository, currently mocked, requires Context parameter.

methods.name: assetsRepository
methods.description: Provides an instance of AssetsRepository, currently mocked.

methods.name: ratingRepository
methods.description: Provides an instance of RatingRepository, currently mocked.

methods.name: useMocks
methods.description: Determines whether to use mock repositories or real implementations based on feature flags.
